mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, NICKNAME, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_EMAIL, SIGNUP_DATE, LAST_ACCESS_DATE, GENDER FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID IS NOT NULL
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, NICKNAME, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_EMAIL, SIGNUP_DATE, LAST_ACCESS_DATE, GENDER FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PW = #{member_pw}, NICKNAME = #{nickname}, MEMBER_EMAIL = #{member_email}, MEMBER_TEL = #{member_tel} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_id}
